directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and cook onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, carrots, sweet potato, and vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are soft, about 20 minutes.
Puree vegetables with an immersion blender until smooth. Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or more to taste
title: Easy Vegan Potato Vegetable Soup
